definitions.definition: that is/are going to be mentioned next

examples.text: The following article was written in 2017.
They arrived on Monday evening and we got there the following day.
In the following nights, Lucy slept poorly.

definitions.definition: a wind blowing in the same direction as a ship or other vehicle that helps it move faster

examples.text: With a generous following wind, we sped across the lake.
With a bit of luck and a following wind, the project will be completed on schedule.
